bpp/descriptor.name: GlobalLinker Mall
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: GlobalLinker is a B2B networking and digitization enablement platform empowering micro and small businesses in creating their digital presence and growing digitally in the new normal.

descriptor.name: LG 190 L 4 Star Inverter Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator
Blue Star 47 L 2 Star Minibar Refrigerator With adjustable Temperature (2023 Model, MR60-GG, Graphite – Grey)
LG 190 L 4 Star Inverter Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator (Color - Red) by Appliances Company
descriptor.short_desc: The LG 190 L 4 Star Inverter Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator offers efficient cooling with its inverter technology, ensuring energy savings and optimal performance. This 4-star rated refrigerator has a 190-liter capacity, perfect for small families. Its sleek design and advanced features provide convenience and style for any kitchen.

descriptor.name: Blue Star 47 L 2 Star Minibar Refrigerator With adjustable Temperature (2023 Model, MR60-GG, Graphite – Grey) (Color - Gray) by Appliances Company
descriptor.short_desc: The Blue Star 47 L 2 Star Minibar Refrigerator (2023 Model, MR60-GG, Graphite-Grey) is perfect for compact spaces. It features adjustable temperature settings, ensuring your beverages and snacks are always at the desired temperature. Its sleek graphite-grey design adds a modern touch, making it an ideal addition to any room or office.

descriptor.name: Havells GHCOTCDK150 OTG 28 LTR DIGI1500-Watt OTG (Black) (Color - Black) by Appliances Company
descriptor.short_desc: The Havells GHCOTCDK150 OTG is a 28-liter, 1500-watt oven toaster grill in sleek black. This versatile OTG offers digital controls for precise cooking, baking, grilling, and toasting. Its spacious interior and powerful performance make it perfect for preparing a variety of delicious dishes, adding convenience and style to your kitchen.
descriptor.long_desc: Specification  Brand – Havells Colour – Black Item Dimensions LxWxH – 48 x 56 x 37 Centimeters Material – Metal Item Weight – 9 Kilograms About this item -Sensor touch lets you control the otg with single touch -It provides you the ability to read the temperature and elements being selected on large led display -2 skewer rods ensure evenly cooked barbeque snacks -Wattage: 1500 W ; Voltage: 230 V, 50 Hz ; Timer: 4 hours and 59 minutes ; Temperature Setting: 90 °C to 230 °C -Includes: OTG, Bake Tray, Grill Rack, Tray Handle, Crumb Tray, Rotisserie Lifter, Rod, Skewers, Instruction Manual and Recipe Book

descriptor.name: Butterfly Smart Glass 3 Burner Gas Stove, Black, Manual Ignition (Color - Black) by Appliances Company
descriptor.short_desc: The Butterfly Smart Glass 3 Burner Gas Stove in black features a sleek design with a durable glass top. This manual ignition stove offers efficient cooking with three burners, providing ample space for multiple dishes. Its elegant look and robust performance make it a perfect addition to any modern kitchen.

descriptor.name: Havells OTG 16T BL – 16 Litre Double Glass Door, 1200 Watt (Black) (Color - Black) by Appliances Company
descriptor.short_desc: The Havells OTG 16T BL is a 16-liter oven toaster grill with a sleek black finish. Featuring a 1200-watt power capacity and double glass doors, it ensures efficient and even cooking. This compact yet powerful OTG is perfect for baking, grilling, and toasting, making it an ideal addition to any modern kitchen.
